text: If you respect yourself in stressful situations, it will help you see the positive. It will help you see the message in the mess.
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Do not worry if you have built your castles in the air. They are where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside; remembering all the times you've felt that way.
author: Charles Bukowski

text: I think you should defend to the death their right to march, and then go down and meet them with baseball bats.
author: Woody Allen

text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

text: I have had dreams, and I have had nightmares. I overcame the nightmares because of my dreams.
author: Dr. Jonas Salk
